Uses of Package
fr.upmc.components.connectors

  • Packages that use fr.upmc.components.connectors 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc
    Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.basic_cs
    Basic client/server example In this example, a basic client/server is constructed.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.dynamic_cs
    Dynamic client/server example This example is meant to learn how to create and execute assembly at run-time, rather than using the static method of the assembly class to create, interconnect and start the components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge
    Component and port for gauges The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.gauge provides a gauge component used to display value read from a sensor.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor
    Component and port for sensor simulators The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor provides a sensor simulator component and its port used to offer its service.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.connectors
    Connecteur pour l'utilisation du SynchronizerManager.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.connectors.syncTools.arrayBlockingQueue
    Connecteurs pour l'utilisation du ArrayBlockingQueue.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.connectors.syncTools.countDownLatch
    Connecteurs pour l'utilisation du CountDownLatch.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.connectors.syncTools.cyclicBarrier
    Connecteurs pour l'utilisation du CyclicBarrier.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.connectors.syncTools.semaphore
    Connecteurs pour l'utilisation du Semaphore.
    fr.upmc.components.extensions.synchronizer.delegates
    Component assemblies for both single computer and distributed deployments.
    fr.upmc.components.patterns.dconnection
    Component dynamic interconnection pattern.
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.
  • Classes in fr.upmc.components.connectors used by fr.upmc.components.connectors 
    Class and Description
    AbstractConnector
    The class AbstractConnector partially implements an abstract connector between two components by assuming that the offering component implements the offered interface.
    AbstractDataConnector
    The class AbstractDataConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data rather than calling each others services.
    AbstractDataTwoWayConnector
    The class AbstractDataTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data in a peer to peer way rather than calling each others services.
    AbstractTwoWayConnector
    The class AbstractTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic connector between components calling each others services in a peer to peer way rather than in a client-provider relationship.
    ConnectionBuilder
    The class ConnectionBuilder groups all the logic for the interconnection of components, implementing location-transparency for components by taking care care of identifying the possible cases (local versus remote) and building the correct connection for each case.
    ConnectorI
    The interface ConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components.
    DataConnectorI
    The interface BasicDataConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others.
    DataTwoWayConnectorI
    The interface DataTwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others, but using the same interface on both sides and act as peers in the exchange.
    TwoWayConnectorI
    The interface TwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between components exposing two-way interfaces.
  • Classes in fr.upmc.components.connectors used by fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc 
    Class and Description
    AbstractConnector
    The class AbstractConnector partially implements an abstract connector between two components by assuming that the offering component implements the offered interface.
    ConnectorI
    The interface ConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components.

    ConnectorI
    The interface ConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components.
    DataConnector
    The class DataConnector partially implements a basic data connector where components call each others using plain Java method calls only.
    DataConnectorI
    The interface BasicDataConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others.
